00014 inline int
00015 arrow_util_create_int_array(int size, int **array)
00016 {
00017     if((*array = malloc(size * sizeof(int))) == NULL)
00018     {
00019         arrow_print_error("Error allocating memory for int array.");
00020         *array = NULL;
00021         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00022     }
00023     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00024 }
00025 
00026 inline int
00027 arrow_util_create_int_matrix(int rows, int cols, int ***matrix, int **space)
00028 {
00029     int i;
00030     
00031     if((*matrix = malloc(rows * sizeof(int *))) == NULL)
00032     {
00033         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate int * array for matrix.");
00034         *matrix = NULL;
00035         *space = NULL;
00036         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00037     }
00038  
00039     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(rows * cols, space))
00040     {
00041         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate int array for matrix space.");
00042         free(*matrix);
00043         *matrix = NULL;
00044         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00045     }
00046  
00047     for(i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00048     {
00049         (*matrix)[i] = (*space) + (i * cols);
00050     }
00051     
00052     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00053 }

00068 void
00069 arrow_util_redirect_stdout_to_file(const char *filename, int *old_stream)
00070 {
00071     fpos_t pos;
00072     fgetpos(stdout, &pos);
00073     *old_stream = dup(fileno(stdout));
00074     freopen(filename, "w", stdout);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void
00078 arrow_util_restore_stdout(int old_stream)
00079 {
00080     fpos_t pos;
00081     fflush(stdout);
00082     dup2(old_stream, fileno(stdout));
00083     close(old_stream);
00084     clearerr(stdout);
00085     fsetpos(stdout, &pos); /* for C9X */
00086 }

00110     to->depotcost      = from->depotcost;

00114 int
00115 arrow_util_CCdatagroup_init_matrix(int size, CCdatagroup *dat)
00116 {   
00117     CCutil_init_datagroup(dat);
00118     if(CCutil_dat_setnorm(dat, CC_MATRIXNORM))
00119     {
00120         arrow_print_error("Couldn't set norm to MATRIXNORM");
00121         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00122     }
00123     
00124     dat->adj = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(size, int *);
00125     dat->adjspace = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(size * (size + 1) / 2, int);
00126     
00127     if(dat->adj == (int **)NULL || dat->adjspace == (int *)NULL)
00128     {
00129         CCutil_freedatagroup(dat);
00130         arrow_print_error("Couldn't create adj/adjspace arrays");
00131         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00132     }
00133     
00134     int i, j;
00135     for(i = 0, j = 0; i < size; i++)
00136     {
00137         dat->adj[i] = dat->adjspace + j;
00138         j += (i + 1);
00139     }
00140     
00141     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00142 }

00144 int
00145 arrow_util_binary_search(int *array, int size, int element, int *pos)
00146 {
00147     int low = 0;
00148     int high = size -1;
00149     int median;
00150     
00151     while(low != high)
00152     {
00153         median = ((high - low) / 2) + low; 
00154         if(array[median] == element)
00155         {
00156             *pos = median;
00157             return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00158         }
00159         else if(array[median] > element)
00160         {
00161             high = median;   
00162         }
00163         else
00164         {
00165             low = median + 1; 
00166         }
00167     }
00168     
00169     *pos = low;
00170     if(array[low] != element)
00171         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00172     else        
00173         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00174 }

00176 int
00177 arrow_util_regex_match(char *string, char *pattern)
00178 {
00179     regex_t re;
00180     int match;
00181     int status;
00182  
00183     if((status = regcomp(&re, pattern, REG_EXTENDED)) != 0)
00184         return ARROW_FALSE;
00185     match = regexec(&re, string, 0, NULL, 0);
00186     regfree(&re);
00187     
00188     if(match == 0)
00189         return ARROW_TRUE;
00190     else
00191         return ARROW_FALSE;
00192 }

00195 arrow_util_print_program_args(int argc, char *argv[], FILE *out)
00196 {
00197     int i;
00198     for(i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00199     {
00200         if(i > 0) fprintf(out, " ");
00201         fprintf(out, "%s", argv[i]);
00202     }

00205 void
00206 arrow_util_random_seed(int seed)
00207 {
00208     if(seed == 0)
00209         srand(time(0));
00210     else
00211         srand((unsigned int)seed);
00212 }

00214 inline int
00215 arrow_util_random()
00216 {

00219 
00220 inline int
00221 arrow_util_random_between(int min, int max)
00222 {
00223     /*return (rand() % (max - min)) + min; */
00224     return min + rand() / (RAND_MAX / (max - min + 1) + 1);
00225 }
00226 
00227 void
00228 arrow_util_permute_array(int size, int *array)
00229 {
00230     int i, c;
00231     for(i = 0; i < size; i++)
00232     {
00233         c = arrow_util_random_between(0, size - 1 - i);
00234         int t = array[i]; 
00235         array[i] = array[i + c];
00236         array[i + c] = t;
00237     }
00238 }

00240 void
00241 arrow_util_write_tour(arrow_problem *problem, char *comment, int *tour, 
00242                       FILE *out)
00243 {
00244     int i;
00245     
00246     fprintf(out, "NAME : %s\n", problem->name);
00247     fprintf(out, "TYPE : TOUR\n");    
00248     fprintf(out, "DIMENSION: %d\n", problem->size);
00249     
00250     if(comment != NULL)
00251         fprintf(out, "COMMENT : %s\n", comment);
00252     
00253     fprintf(out, "TOUR_SECTION\n");
00254     for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00255         fprintf(out, "%d\n", tour[i] + 1);
00256     fprintf(out, "-1\n");
00257 }
00258 
00259 void
00260 arrow_util_sbtsp_to_abstp_tour(arrow_problem *problem, int *old_tour,
00261                                int *new_tour)
00262 {
00263     int i;
00264     int n = problem->size / 2;
00265     int dir = problem->get_cost(problem, old_tour[0], old_tour[1]);
00266         
00267     for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
00268     {
00269         if(dir >= 0)
00270             new_tour[i] = old_tour[2 * i];
00271         else
00272             new_tour[n - i - 1] = old_tour[2 * i];
00273     }
00274 }
00275 
00276 void
00277 arrow_util_write_problem(arrow_problem *problem, char *comment, FILE *out)
00278 {
00279     int i, j;
00280     
00281     fprintf(out, "NAME : %s\n", problem->name);
00282     fprintf(out, "TYPE : TSP\n");    
00283     fprintf(out, "DIMENSION: %d\n", problem->size);
00284     
00285     if(comment != NULL)
00286         fprintf(out, "COMMENT : %s\n", comment);
00287         
00288     fprintf(out, "EDGE_WEIGHT_TYPE: EXPLICIT\n");
00289     fprintf(out, "EDGE_WEIGHT_FORMAT: LOWER_DIAG_ROW\n");
00290     fprintf(out, "EDGE_WEIGHT_SECTION\n");
00291     
00292     for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00293     {
00294         for(j = 0; j <= i; j++)
00295         {
00296             if(i == j)
00297                 fprintf(out, "0\n");
00298             else
00299                 fprintf(out, "%d\t", problem->get_cost(problem, i, j));
00300         }
00301     }
00302         
00303     fprintf(out, "EOF\n");
00304 }
